data.name: To Be A King Volume 1 - Official Guide
data.detailed_description:
This official guide will help you get the most out of your playing time in To Be A King. You will see what you need to do in order to unlock scenes, get achievements, and not miss out on all the content in the game. Over 150 pages of information on Volume 1 of To Be A King is here.

  • A walkthrough covering how to unlock all the scenes in the scene gallery & get all the Steam achievements
  • Detailed information on all the love interests and many other characters in the game
  • Exclusive renders not seen before in full high resolution
  • Playing advice from the developer himself
  • Get a detailed explanation of the different points systems in the game
  • Find out how to unlock every love interest

All of this as a PDF you can refer to while you play the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista or Higher
  • Processor: 2.0ghz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The contains contains mature language and nudity. It also contains graphic depictions of sexual activity, including oral, vaginal, and other sexual activity.
